ComicInfo.Summary: in this FREE intro to the Farmhouse mini series, we take a look inside Pinewood mental Institution where an inmate is dragged from his cel and forced to create a bizarre piece of art. A great way to start the farmhouse mini-series. Also includes a description of the characters we meet in issues 1-7. Join us for the dark thriller/drama entitled Farmhouse where Sam Corneile, a drifter, returns home to take a job at a local mental institution where he discovers a group of patients being exploited under an art therapy regimen. While there, he falls for Helen, a feisty but troubled female who dares him to confront his past.
